item.description: FDA extends Ascendis' TransCon CNP review to Feb. 28, 2026, after new data submission related to post-marketing study requirements. read more

item.title: Boeing Strengthens Defense Orders With Historic Apache Deal
item.description: Boeing wins $4.7 billion contract to build 96 AH-64E Apache helicopters for Poland, the largest non-US purchase in the program's history. read more
